title: Did Ben Shapiro Say ‘Every Regular Human’ Owns Zip Ties After US Capitol Riot?
subtitle: Some members of the mob that attacked the Capitol were spotted wielding plastic zip cuffs.
author: Nur Ibrahim
vclaim: Conservative commentator Ben Shapiro tweeted: “Literally every regular human I know owns zip ties,” amid discussion about rioters carrying zip cuffs at the U.S. Capitol insurrection.
